ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Ultra Optimus goes into his crashed ship, and queries the computer for the presence for any other ship on the planet. About a few momments later, the computer

Ultra Optimus goes into his crashed ship, and queries the computer 
for the presence for any other ship on the planet. About a few 
momments later, the computer detects something strange. Ultra Optimus 
stops the scan, and queries the computer on the object. The computer 
identifies it as the  old, Autobot Ark. Ultra Optimus remarks that 
this is getting interesting, and decides to investigate the Ark. The 
heads out of the ship, and Transforms into a Missle Frigate(AKA 
Missile Bomber). He heads out to the Ark's supposed coordinates.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (Icedemon...no offense, but do you pay any attention when you 
read?  
> Shockwave is in a huge forest deep under the cover of a canopy of 
branches 
> and leaves.  Now, if you mean Soundwave is in a cave, but Shockwave 
isn't)
> 
> 
> Smokescreen/Beachcomber:
> 
> 
> 
> Smokescreen and Beachcomber saluted Iron Raptor.
> 
> 
> <All non-damaged Maximals, or all who don't need repairs, meet 
outside of the 
> Ark for orders.  By order of Iron Raptor, we need to get things 
moving quick 
> before someone slaughters us with an attack>
